doc.after: Boas s work in physical anthropology brought together his interest in Darwinian evolution with his interest in migration as a cause of change His most important research in this field was his study of changes in body form among children of immigrants in New York Boas s primary interest in symbolic and material culture and in language was the study of processes of change he therefore set out to determine whether bodily forms are also subject to processes of change
